summary: TAKATA RECALL - DESPITE THE RECALL HAVING BEEN ISSUED JUNE 1, 2016 - FORD HAS YET TO MAKE A REPLACEMENT AVAILABLE FOR THE DEFECTIVE COMPONENT.  I HAVE TWO OF THESE CARS DRIVEN BY MY DAUGHTERS.  TAKATA TELLS CUSTOMERS TO CONTACT FORD DEALERSHIPS, FORD DEALERSHIPS TELL CUSTOMERS THAT THERE IS NO FIX FOR THIS????  PLEASE EXPLAIN THE LACK OF ACTION BY FORD
